content:
Set Up the Claims Adjuster Workbench

Give claims adjusters the information and tools they need to efficiently assess and adjudicate claims.

Claims First Notice of Loss
The FNOL flow kicks off claims processing, supporting photos, police reports, and files that support a claim.

Configure the Claim Participant UI
The LWC Claim Participant UI shows claim participants and involved items associated with each participant. It lets the claims adjuster add, edit, and delete participants and items.

Customize the Claims Adjuster's View of Claim Details
Administrators configure page layouts to help adjusters assess claims at a glance.

Configure Payment Actions Based on Claim Payment Status
Use a flexible framework to provide financial actions to claims adjusters based on claim payments. Configure payment actions for initial payments, approval processes and payment issuance, and payment cancellations.

Configure the Claim Financial Summary
Claims adjusters can monitor financials using charts that answer key questions: What are the losses worth? How much of the reserve is left? 

Track Claim Recoveries
Gain insight into claim recoveries and how pending and actual recoveries impact overall financial exposure. Maintain a complete history of each step of the recovery effort.

Manage Workersâ€™ Compensation Claims
Track claimant earnings, establish recurring payment schedules, and track formal progress toward someone's capacity to return to work after sustaining a work-related injury or other disability.

Configure Insurance History with Claim History LWC DataPack
Configure the Insurance History Lightning web component to create a cohesive view of all things happening with a claim. A DataPack includes story object configuration that brings essential content into a Claim History tab out of the box.

Keep Claims Processing on Track with Action Plans
Assign tasks and set completion dates to keep your staff focused and your performance goals on target. Action plans assign tasks and deadlines to claim team members based on their role.

Divvy Up Work On Your Claims Team with Routing
Configure Omni-Channel to route claims to the best-fit person on your team based on availability and priority of work. Route work to queues or skills depending on business needs.
title: Configure Claims Adjustment Workbench
